#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar()
using namespace std;
int ra()
{
	int r=0;
	char c=gc;
	while(c<'0' || c>'9')
	c=gc;
	while(c>='0' && c<='9')
	{
		r=(r<<3)+(r<<1)+c-'0';
		c=gc;
	}
	return r;
}

int main()
{
	int t,n;
	for(t=ra();t>0;t--)
	{
		n=ra();
		if(n==0 || n==1)
		   printf("NO\n");
		else
		  printf("YES\n");

	}
	return 0;
}
